        public static boolean isJcopInNormalMode()
        Determine whether JCOP is in normal mode or OSU mode.

        Returns:
        boolean : true if integrity check is required otherwise false

        public static byte[] checkAndwrapPacket​(byte[] inputBuffer)
        Checks the input as proprietary apdu and wraps it as GP apdu

        Returns:

      • createIntegrityCheckCmd

        public static byte[] createIntegrityCheckCmd​(byte[] hash,
                                             byte[] signature)
        Creates Integrity Check Command
        Parameters:
        hash - : hash value in Integrity command
        signature - : signature value in Integrity command
        Returns:
        byte[] : formated command in below format GPHeader DGIHEADER Length HASHTAG Length HashData SignatureTAG Length SignatureData LE
